---
title: mermaid
---

Generates a network from mermaid code. See `https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/Tutorials`. This component uses the external mermaid.ink service to generate visual networks.


## Argument help

Run the following command to view the module's help page:
```bash
nextflow run openpipelines-bio/openpipeline -r main_build -main-script target/nextflow/report/mermaid/main.nf --help
```

### Arguments



:::{.column-body-outset}
|Name       |Description                  |Attributes               |
|:----------|:----------------------------|:------------------------|
|`--input`  |Input directory              |file, required           |
|`--output` |Generated network as output. |file, required           |
|`--test`   |The test file to be executed |file, default: "test.py" |
:::
